text: Luz Maria Rivas (born February 6, 1974) is an American politician. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She is a member of the United States House of Representatives for since 2025. Rivas was a member of the California State Assembly from 2018 to 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== *Join California - Luz Maria Rivas * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from California Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Luz Rivas
